events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Amanda has been assigned to handle this refund request following the incorrect delivery.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request due to receiving the wrong item.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I've attached a photo showing the item I received which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the prompt response and clear instructions on the refund process.
We have confirmed the refund has been initiated. Please allow up to 5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
I received the refund today. Thank you very much for your help and quick resolution!
The case regarding the refund for the wrong item has been closed successfully with customer confirmation.
We have sent you a survey to collect your feedback on the support experience. Your input is very valuable to us.
